welcome.headline: Starting out is the hardest part – and you have already done it!
welcome.subtitle: Let's personalize your journey together

goal.title: What's your goal?
goal.subtitle: Help us understand your motivation

support.title: Support that actually works
support.subtitle: Your nutritionist is always here to keep you on track

blurbs.default: Personalized support keeps you accountable and steadily moving toward your target.
blurbs.loseWeight: With coaching, your calorie deficit stays consistent and safer for long-term success.
blurbs.buildWeight: We will focus on nutrient-dense meals and enough movement to support lean gains without feeling sluggish.
blurbs.getHealthier: Structured routines make it easier to hit nutrition and movement targets every day.
blurbs.lookBetter: Balanced macros and accountability help you tighten up and build a leaner look.
blurbs.moreEnergy: Dialed-in nutrition, hydration, and sleep routines keep your energy more stable.

pace.goalClose: You are already very close to your goal

moveMore.desc: Boosts energy and gives you more flexibility with your calories

timeline.title: See what's ahead
timeline.weekDesc: You'll see your first results — around {{change}} kg {{direction}}. This is the first win that comes from fixing habits and building a healthier relationship with food.
timeline.goalDesc: You'll reach your goal of {{directionVerb}} {{change}} kg. You'll feel better, more energetic, and proud of how far you've come.

progressCheck.note: You will notice changes in how you feel as your body adjusts to healthier habits. This is a normal response to positive lifestyle changes.

disclaimer.title: Guiding you with care
disclaimer.text: Welmi provides personalized eating recommendations, adapting to your individual health profile and dietary needs.
disclaimer.textSmall: However, our app is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Before starting any new diet or if you have any health concerns, always consult a qualified healthcare professional.
